ch0057_00_shiba/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
I have been waiting for you.
You have a good glint in your eye today!
ch0057_00_shiba/0101_0701_02_10:
Make sure to keep training!
Hoo hah!
ch0057_00_shiba/0601_0701_02_10:
That is power that can only be born from his
limber body.
ch0057_00_shiba/0601_0701_03_10:
As a martial artist, I aspire to the flexibility
that Hitmonlee possesses.
ch0057_00_shiba/0601_0701_04_10: I hope I can kick like him one day, too.
ch0057_00_shiba/0601_0702_01_10: To learn the skills your Pokémon possess...
ch0057_00_shiba/0601_0702_02_10:
will lead to more deeply understanding
your Pokémon.
ch0057_00_shiba/0602_0701_01_10:
I enjoy training.
In fact, I have few other hobbies.
ch0057_00_shiba/0602_0701_02_10:
The joy of pursuing strength comes with its
share of hardships.
ch0057_00_shiba/0602_0701_03_10:
But even then, I have one thing that soothes
my tired body.
ch0057_00_shiba/0602_0701_04_10: Spas! The Ember Spa is the best!
ch0057_00_shiba/0602_0702_01_10:
I soak in the springs while I think about the
next day’s training routine.
ch0057_00_shiba/0602_0702_02_10:
Absolute bliss!
You should come with me sometime!
ch0057_00_shiba/0603_0701_01_10:
Machamp, just like his name says,
is a champion!
ch0057_00_shiba/0603_0701_02_10:
He’s also been my partner since my
younger days!
ch0057_00_shiba/0603_0701_03_10:
We exposed ourselves to harsh environments
and communicated with our fists.
ch0057_00_shiba/0603_0701_04_10:
And ultimately, the bond that was born has
been between us since.
ch0057_00_shiba/0603_0702_01_10:
Machamp’s power is an inspiration to martial
artists everywhere.
ch0057_00_shiba/0603_0702_02_10: He is also the perfect example of a honed body.
ch0057_00_shiba/0604_0701_01_10:
If it leads to me becoming stronger, I’ll eat and
drink anything. I have no preference in taste.
ch0057_00_shiba/0604_0701_02_10:
The only exception is the Rage Candy Bar!
Rage Candy Bars are the best!
ch0057_00_shiba/0604_0701_03_10:
A great flavor that rejuvenates my tired body 
after training. The rushing energy!
ch0057_00_shiba/0604_0701_04_10:
Such unspeakable joys...
I wish I could teach you those joys, too...
ch0057_00_shiba/0604_0702_01_10:
The moment you chomp down on one of
those bars!
ch0057_00_shiba/0604_0702_02_10:
Absolute bliss!
The one moment I do not want to be disturbed.
All this talk is making me hungry!
ch0057_00_shiba/0605_0701_01_10:
Training, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Good! I like seeing honed Pokémon!
ch0057_00_shiba/0605_0701_02_10:
I can sense strength from you as well!
But do not be satisfied with that!
ch0057_00_shiba/0605_0701_03_10:
The way I became a member of the Elite Four
was by wanting to battle strong Trainers!
ch0057_00_shiba/0605_0701_04_10:
Every day is a lesson!
And there is no end to learning!
ch0057_00_shiba/0605_0702_01_10:
Maybe this time, I’ll try to train you!
I believe in your potential!
ch0057_00_shiba/0605_0702_02_10: I will train you until you collapse from fatigue!
ch0057_00_shiba/1701_0701_01_10: This is a gift from me to you!
ch0057_00_shiba/1701_0701_02_10: Use this and train even harder!
ch0057_00_shiba/1701_0702_01_10: No need to thank me! Just get stronger!
ch0057_00_shiba/2501_0701_01_10:
Do you like candy bars?
I personally love them!
ch0057_00_shiba/2501_0701_02_10:
I especially like the Rage Candy Bars sold in
Mahogany Town in the Johto region.
ch0057_00_shiba/2501_0701_03_10:
You should try them out sometime!
I promise you won’t regret it!
Rage Candy Bars are the best!
ch0057_00_shiba/2501_0702_01_10:
There are plenty of people out there much
stronger than I am.
ch0057_00_shiba/2501_0702_02_10:
And in the same vein, there may be a candy bar
out there that is better than a Rage Candy Bar!
ch0057_00_shiba/2501_0702_03_10:
If I find any on Pasio, I will definitely let
you know!
ch0057_00_shiba/2511_0701_01_10:
To be strong is to always look up and
never stop.
ch0057_00_shiba/2511_0701_02_10:
To never be satisfied, to humble yourself,
and to always aim higher...
ch0057_00_shiba/2511_0701_03_10: That is how you will discover your true strength!
ch0057_00_shiba/2511_0702_01_10:
The top of the PML is not the final goal!
It is only a checkpoint!
ch0057_00_shiba/2511_0702_02_10:
I will keep believing in my possibilities and
keep charging through my limits!
ch0057_00_shiba/2511_0702_03_10:
And once I’ve gotten stronger,
I want us to battle each other!
ch0057_00_shiba/3001_0701_01_10:
If you have no plans for the day,
you are welcome to join me in my training.
ch0057_00_shiba/3002_0701_01_10:
I’m ready for a steaming hot shower now that
my morning workout is over.
ch0057_00_shiba/3003_0701_01_10:
True discipline is not accomplished in a day.
Constant training over time is key.
ch0057_00_shiba/3004_0701_01_10:
All that intense training earlier has
given me a mean appetite...
ch0057_00_shiba/3005_0701_01_10:
Exposure to the cold night wind is no good.
You must take care of your body above all else.
ch0057_00_shiba/3006_0701_01_10:
Huh, it got dark so fast. Time to wash off
the day’s sweat with a dip in the hot springs.
